title: Banned
body:
What's the chances of being permanently banned for saying r%%%%%ed, worthless af or worst team I ever been on?

My account got permanately banned because I said my adc was r%%%%%ed and useless pretty much..... I feel as though the reporting/ for abuse/toxicness can be abused it self... Ive been reported in games before for literally not doing much of anything wrong but because toxic people just want to harass you..... I don't bother reporting people because every game I have ever played has had people like that and its just been part of it... Wc3/wc2 diablo2 WoW every game literally.... I feel like my case should be reviewed...

replies.body: Nah fam, "retarded" will almost always get you punished. Things like what you suggested aren't cool or beneficial to helping your team win, so they really don't have any place in League.

It was something I was wanting to look into in case they had some kind of unique/special case. Turns out they just wanted to move certain skins or champs over, which isn't something we can do. 

That wasn't me saying we could do anything, but just asking what their reason was so maybe we could find other ways to help.

Go ahead and shoot me a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (Mention Broporo and being boards related) or reach out to me in our [**Moderation Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification) if you don't mind. I feel terrible for alerting the OP each time we respond here xD. That way we can chat about the finer details and see if I can work something out for ya ^_^

Yeah, it's really never okay to call someone retarded and useless. Once you've had a 14 day ban, you're on very thin ice and abusing your teammates like that just won't fly. If you need official answer as to why you were punished or any other clarification, you can post your chat logs on the [Player Behavior boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) and other players can weigh in.

majority of the time its me replying to them being toxic I don't report them though.....  I wish I could post a picture of a guy being toxic to me for no reason... And REPORTING ME... When I did nothing and when I reply to them is usually when I Get in trouble.... I feel like there is uncontrollable double standards that are not paid attention too... I get banned for replying to a sludge pit...

Everyone's held to the same standard. You misbehaved, and you were reported, hence why you got punished. If you chose not to report the other player, that's your right, but that does not excuse your behavior.
